verses.name: 2 Corinthians 8:5
verses.text: And this they did, not as we hoped, but first gave their own selves to the Lord, and unto us by the will of God.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 8:6
verses.text: Insomuch that we desired Titus, that as he had begun, so he would also finish in you the same grace also.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 8:7
verses.text: Therefore, as ye abound in every thing, in faith, and utterance, and knowledge, and in all diligence, and in your love to us, see that ye abound in this grace also.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 8:8
verses.text: I speak not by commandment, but by occasion of the forwardness of others, and to prove the sincerity of your love.
